title: Cash
description: Our Equity Service Cash is a premier offering designed to empower investors seeking to capitalize on the dynamic world of equity markets. With our comprehensive suite of investment solutions, we aim to optimize your financial gains and help you achieve your long-term wealth-building goals.

cashDataInfo.title: Intraday Calls
body: This package is suitable for small and medium traders, who look for moderate returns with low risk and who look for daily short term advice for Indian stock market.
WHO SHOULD SUBSCRIBE THIS SERVICE?
If your Intraday trading volume is between 1 lac to 3 lac, then you should definitely subscribe this service.
SERVICES FEATURE

• We will provide 1-2 Cash Intraday Tips every day.
  • We will provide 20-22 Cash intraday trading tips in a month
  • Approx 1% return per call
  • Trading tips given via Web Login / App.
  • Our Executives will call after market hours for trade verification and support.
INTRADAY TIPS SAMPLE CALLS:
(INTRADAY CALL) BUY ADANIENT ABOVE 160 TGT 161.50, 163 SL 158 (NSE CASH)
FOLLOW UP CALLS :(INTRADAY CALL) OUR 1ST TGT ACHIVED IN ADANIENT AT 161.50. OUR BUY CALL GIVEN AT 160.(INTRADAY CALL) OUR ALL TGT ACHIVED IN ADANIENT AT 163. OUR BUY CALL GIVEN AT 160.

cashDataInfo.title: Intraday Calls
body: This package is suitable for short term positional traders, who want to gain more by holding suggested stock.

• 2-4 calls per month
  • 1-6 months average holding period per call
